name: Adventure to the Deep
description: To enter the shelter press on the first door. The second task is to guess the combination. Before the second door, just press on the lattice and then on the door/ After that, before the lift you shall click on that electro box and make the combination at right similar to that on the left, also click on the lever.  After a lift click on the door, you shall complete that labyrinth, control blue square with arrows on the keyboard.
